name: Lara Croft: The Sun Obelisk
storyline: The Sun Obelisk follows Lara’s attempts to find the forgotten Sun Obelisk, an artifact that grants special powers to anyone who has contact with. However, the map that was showing the location of the Sun Obelisk has been stolen by Lara’s former friend, Damian Strathairn. But Lara had a copy of that map.... and the adventure begins...
summary:
Lara Croft: The Sun Obelisk is a text based game run by ADRIFT (Adventure Development & Runner - Interactive Fiction Toolkit) tool. 
 
The story is about Lara Croft that try to search for the Sun Obelisk. There is an adult and non-adult version. It contains about 31 rooms with 5 to 6 object to take.
